mapper.sql: SELECT u.USER_ID, u.EMAIL, u.PASSWORD, u.NAME, u.ROLE, u.REG_DATE, u.DEPT_ID, d.NAME as deptName FROM TB_USER u JOIN TB_DEPT d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE u.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE TB_USER SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, DEPT_ID, ROLE, REG_DATE) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{deptId}, #{role}, #{regDate} )
